thread.title: Parliament re-vetting officials

author: news24.com
title: Parliament re-vetting officials
text:
Cape Town- Parliament is re-vetting its officials, it said in a statement.
The institution this week launched a programme to re-vet officials to determine their security competence.
The process is being facilitated by the State Security Agency.
"Parliamentâ€™s security policy requires all employees to undergo vetting and all staff appointments are subject to positive security clearance," Parliament said on Friday.
